verses.text: O Lord God of hosts, and Creator of all things, who art rich in mercy and abundant in goodness.
I have sinned against Thee, O Lord, and I have done evil in Thy sight; my transgressions are many, and I am not worthy to look upon the height of heaven.
But Thou, O Lord, art patient and long-suffering, and Thy mercies are over all Thy works.
Hearken now to the prayer of Thy servant, and receive the supplication of him who confesses his faults before Thee.
Turn me, O Lord, and I shall be turned; heal me, and I shall be healed; for Thou art my praise and my God.
Cleanse me from my secret sins, and spare Thy servant from the power of the enemy.
Let Thy grace be upon me, and let the light of Thy countenance shine into the darkness of my heart.
For Thou art the God of the penitent, and in Thee I put my trust, now and forever, and unto the ages of ages. Amen.
